attention3.ptxt: For identification of each cylinder and bank, refer to Precaution for Identification of Cylinder and Bank:N32A .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0016: Crankshaft Position – Camshaft Position Correlation Bank 1 Sensor “A”

entry.ptxt: Difference between camshaft (bank 1 / intake side) position and crankshaft position is out of specified range.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: P0017: Crankshaft Position – Camshaft Position Correlation Bank 1 Sensor “B”

entry.ptxt: Difference between camshaft (bank 1 / exhaust side) position and crankshaft position is out of specified range.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: P0018: Crankshaft Position – Camshaft Position Correlation Bank 2 Sensor “A”

entry.ptxt: Difference between camshaft (bank 2 / intake side) position and crankshaft position is out of specified range.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

ptxt.emph: P0019: Crankshaft Position – Camshaft Position Correlation Bank 2 Sensor “B”

entry.ptxt: Difference between camshaft (bank 2 / exhaust side) position and crankshaft position is out of specified range.
(2 D/C detection logic but MIL does not light up)

item.ptxt: If DTC other than aimed DTC are previously detected in DTC confirmation procedure, be sure to troubleshoot DTC previously detected.
Check to make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this procedure.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Run engine at idle speed for 3 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.title: CMP sensor and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check CMP sensor, signal rotor and its circuit related to DTC according to Step 2 through 6 under DTC P0342 / P0343 / P0347 / P0348 / P0367 / P0368 / P0392 / P0393:N32A .

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: CKP sensor and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check CKP sensor, signal rotor and its circuit according to Step 2 through 7 under DTC P0335 / P0336:N32A .

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

test1.ptxt: For bank related to DTC, check the following items.

item.ptxt: 1st timing chain and timing chain tensioner adjuster:
2nd timing chain (bank 1) and timing chain tensioner adjuster No.1:
2nd timing chain (bank 2) and timing chain tensioner adjuster No.3:

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
